explains: v. 猛冲（dash 的现在分词）
adj. （尤指男子）风度翩翩的，浪漫迷人的；时髦的，流行的
wordGroup: a dash of 少许；一点儿
dash off v. 匆忙完成
cut a dash 大出风头；摆阔
dash along v. 滔滔不绝
dash out v. 冲出，跑开；删去，勾掉
em dash n. 长破折号

sentences.en: He was dashing, self-confident and flirtatious.
sentences.cn: 他风度翩翩、自信满满且善于调情。

sentences.en: Father Auberon's Academy Club positively heaved with dashing young men.
sentences.cn: 奥伯龙神父学院俱乐部里实实在在满是风度翩翩的年轻男子。

sentences.en: The waves were dashing against the harbour wall.
sentences.cn: 海浪撞击着港湾的坝堤。
